The claim of Netflix offering a free one: year subscription due to the COVID-19 pandemic was debunked by Snopes, a trusted fact-checking organization.
Snopes provided evidence of a scam circu: falsely informing viewers about the free subscription offer.
Snopes shared an example of the scam fou: including the text of the scam and a link, which was likely a phishing site.
